requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源（调用方和有赞约定的值）

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['address']="浙江省杭州市西湖区黄龙万科中心"
params['mobile']="13185987452"
params['postcode']=0571
params['receiver']="测试"
params['refund_order_no']="201901081132270000010838"
params['remark']="测试"
params['retail_source']="GUANYIYUN"
params['version']=1546918347805

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.refundorder.goodsreturn.agree', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

';
